title: Episode 161 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 161 including plot summary, character appearances, production details, and trivia about the Ordeal of Spheres battle.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about the conclusion of the Satori battle and Skypiea arc events

title: Satori - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Satori detailing his role as one of Enel's priests, his Mantra abilities, Impact Dial usage, and the Ordeal of Balls. Includes information about how he was eventually defeated.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Satori's defeat in episode 162

title: Aisa - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Aisa, the young Shandia girl who debuts in this episode. Details her natural Mantra ability and role in the Skypiea arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Aisa's role throughout the entire Skypiea arc

title: Episodes 160-161: Satori, the Mantra Master & Desperate Struggle in the Lost Forest
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: Personal blog post reviewing episodes 160-161 featuring the battle with Satori. Discusses first-time viewer reactions to Mantra abilities and the Ordeal of Balls.

title: Revisiting Skypiea: Essential Episodes and Underrated Gems
author: ChibiBytes
description: Article discussing the Skypiea arc's importance and highlighting essential episodes. Notes how Mantra was introduced in this arc and later became central as Observation Haki.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea arc and references to later series developments

title: Skypiea Is the Best One Piece Arc
author: Sam Leach
description: Editorial arguing that Skypiea is the best arc in One Piece, discussing its themes, character development, and world-building significance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Skypiea arc

title: One Piece: Skypiea Is the Arc You Either Love or Hate
author: CBR Editorial
description: Article analyzing why the Skypiea arc is so divisive among One Piece fans, discussing its pacing issues and long-term importance to the series.

title: One Piece: Why Skypiea Is The Most Crucial Arc In The Story So Far
author: GameRant
description: Analysis of why Skypiea is crucial to One Piece's overarching narrative, discussing the introduction of Observation Haki (Mantra), Poneglyphs, and other long-term plot elements.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses connections to later arcs and reveals throughout the series

title: One Piece: Skypiea Arc Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial
description: Comprehensive recap and review of the Skypiea arc, rating it 7/10 and noting it as visually engaging but with pacing challenges. Discusses the priests and their ordeals.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full arc recap with spoilers for the entire Skypiea story

title: One Piece - Episode 161 (Official Stream)
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for Episode 161 on Crunchyroll, featuring English subtitles.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Episode only contains content from episode 161

title: Observation Haki (Mantra) - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page explaining Observation Haki, including its introduction as 'Mantra' in the Skypiea arc with Satori as one of the first users shown.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Observation Haki throughout the entire series including advanced applications
